scene.name: One
scene.dialog: Hey! IT guy wait!. My internet connection has failed, SOLVE IT!Lorem ipsum, dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Illum, recusandae impedit deserunt tempore laborum voluptate? Incidunt, corrupti perspiciatis? Vel, cupiditate exercitationem. Repellat necessitatibus neque facere ipsa eius molestias quisquam quidem!Lorem Lorem ipsum, dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Recusandae, provident, nemo neque excepturi sequi consectetur sit officiis dolorum incidunt vero ut autem quam odit cupiditate. Beatae, facilis tenetur! Maxime, officia!
Yooooo my internet connection is not working too, you better hurry with that fix.
